scripts.docker:clean: docker image prune -f && docker compose -f env-dev/docker-compose.yaml down -v
scripts.docker:clean:img: docker image prune -f && docker compose -f env-dev/docker-compose.yaml down -v --rmi all
scripts.docker:db: docker compose -f env-dev/docker-compose.yaml up --build -d pilliz-db-dev dbadmin
scripts.docker:db:reset: docker compose -f env-dev/docker-compose.yaml rm -s -v -f pilliz-db-dev && docker volume rm pilliz-db-dev-data
scripts.docker:dev: docker image prune -f && pnpm docker:db && docker compose -f env-dev/docker-compose.yaml up --build pilliz-backend-dev
scripts.docker:lint: docker compose -f env-dev/docker-compose.yaml exec pilliz-backend-dev pnpm lint
scripts.docker:test: docker image prune -f && docker compose -f env-dev/docker-compose.yaml up --build pilliz-backend-test
scripts.docker:test:cov: docker image prune -f && docker compose -f env-dev/docker-compose.yaml -f env-dev/docker-compose-test-cov.yaml up --build pilliz-backend-test
scripts.docker:test:watch: docker image prune -f && docker compose -f env-dev/docker-compose.yaml -f env-dev/docker-compose-test-watch.yaml up --build pilliz-backend-test
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: dotenv -e env-dev/.env.dev -- npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:reset: dotenv -e env-dev/.env.dev -- npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.prisma:pull:dev: dotenv -e env-dev/.env.dev -- npx prisma db pull
scripts.docker:staging: docker image prune -f && docker compose -f env-staging/docker-compose-staging-dev.yaml up --build pilliz-backend-staging-dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:staging: dotenv -e env-staging/.env.staging -- npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:pull:staging: dotenv -e env-staging/.env.staging -- npx prisma db pull
scripts.prisma:migrate:prod: dotenv -e env-prod/.env.prod -- npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:pull:prod: dotenv -e env-prod/.env.prod -- npx prisma db pull
